title: Stupid Idea of the Week
body: Rito releases skins like 2-4 weeks after a patch. Gets annoying when you have that sweet dosh and funnel ready. How about Rito releases a skin with the patch for once so that our funnel doesn't feel rejected?

replies.body:
good idea of the week.
don't spend money on league of legends.

best idea of the week. 
uninstall the game from ur pc
